channel.title: Npc exp how i change?
channel.description:
ok i want to make the exp like runescape so people on my server don't level as fast as they want to lol but yes i want to know how to change teh xp
Example: now if i atk a level 2 my combat level will be 11 from 1 i want it like this : i atk a level 2 and go from 1 to maybe 2 just like 20 exp for something
plase tell me is this is hard or not.

item.title: Npc exp how i change?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well… not too hard, you just have to change the exp rates , like per hit, runescape is 4 exp per hit for str att and def, if it goes to lvl 11 from 1 and it hits a two, then that is probably like 650 exp per hit, and you want it to get from 1 to 2 in
when they hit a 2? 1 to 2 is 83 exp, then you want each hit 41.5 exp, im not sure were to change this, but just giving you an idea, probably in client.java though, im just giving you an idea of what it would be like

Read full topic
